publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4956.1 Murdo Fraser: Role of Colleges in the Economic Recoveryâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-4956) in the name of Fiona Hyslop, insert at end "and urges the Scottish Government to encourage the Scottish Further and Higher Education Funding Council, in allocating funds to the sector, to recognise the particular needs of colleges in rural areas."
